QuestData.Title: Back So Soon?
QuestData.Description: <High-Oracle Soo-say stares at your forehead for a while before speaking.>$B$BSoo-gan ask for help. We think they might have been attacked by puppy-men again.$B$BWe sending you and Jaloot to help... follow west river up to Mistwhisper Refuge. Do what Soo-gan says... hit the puppy-men on the nose if they being mean, they don't like that.$B$B<High-Oracle Soo-say goes back to staring at your forehead as you leave.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Mistwhisper Refuge and speak to Mistcaller Soo-gan.$B$BIf you lose Jaloot's Favorite Crystal, speak to High-Oracle Soo-say in Rainspeaker Canopy.
QuestData.RewardText: We think we seen you before. You visit Mistwhisper village sometime already?$B$BSoo-say said you good. Soo-say smart, so we trust you too.$B$B<Mistcaller Soo-gan offers an awkwardly large smile.>
